abstract: Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation,  signaling an interest in the education sector, has  hired Joel Klein, the New York City schools chancellor.News Corporation announced Mr. Klein’s hiring shortly after it was reported that he was stepping down from the public school system. Mr. Klein will be an executive vice president, reporting to Mr. Murdoch, the chairman and chief executive.

lead_paragraph: 4:39 p.m. | Updated Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation, signaling an interest in education, has hired Joel Klein, the New York City schools chancellor, as an executive vice president.

headline.main: News Corp. Reels In a Top Educator

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Tim Arango
